TITLE: Diamond City - Home Page
UPCOMING_RELEASES_DESCRIPTION: Stay up to date with the latest releases at Diamond Cinema.
FIRST_NAME_MINLENGTH_ERROR: First name must be at least 2 characters
LAST_NAME_MINLENGTH_ERROR: Last name must be at least 2 characters
EMAIL_PATTERN_ERROR: Please enter a valid email address
PASSWORD_MINLENGTH_ERROR: Password must be at least 6 characters
PROMOTIONS_TITLE: Choose the perfect promotion for you
PROMOTIONS_SUBTITLE: Enjoy the cinema at an attractive price
TICKET_PRICING_INFO: The cinema ticket offices open daily 30 minutes before the first screening. Check today's repertoire to find out from when we are open. Ticket prices are in PLN.
DISCOUNT_INFO:
* Student tickets are available for:
 – students – student ID
 – children under 12 (children under 1 – free)
 – university students – university ID
 – PhD students – PhD student ID
 – retirees – retiree ID
 – teachers – teacher ID
SENIOR_INFO: ** For Senior screenings, tickets for all screenings (from Monday to Thursday all day). Tickets are available to those with a retiree ID. The promotion does not apply to festivals and special events. From Friday to Sunday, tickets are available at the price of 26 PLN.
PROMOTION_MONDAY: MOVIE MONDAYS – 16 PLN for all screenings except special events and festivals.
PROMOTION_WEDNESDAY: MOVIE WEDNESDAYS – 19 PLN for all screenings except special events and festivals.
REFUND_POLICY: Ticket refunds are possible no later than 30 minutes before the start of the screening. Refunds for tickets purchased online are only possible at the cinema ticket offices.
